texts.en: For the last eight years, John has provided transportation services along a semi-urban town route to a nearby weigh bridge in the outskirts of Nairobi. His challenges are strong competition from similar businesses and few customers during the rainy season. John will use the proceeds of KES 20,000 to buy three crates of tomatoes for his new business of selling tomatoes, where he will use his motorbike to access customers. He is married and has one daughter. John describes himself as a hardworking, polite and visionary man.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes for a new business venture.

loans.name: Patience

texts.en: Patience is 45 years old and married with 3 children. Her husband teaches in a government school and he also helps to support their family. She sells used clothes. This is the high season for sales and she hopes to gain more profits. She says her business is expanding and is looking forward to having a bigger stall in the future. She hopes for a loan in the amount of NGN 100,000 to purchase more used clothes to sell. She says "thanks" to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy W. has been selling vegetables and fruit to residents at Kiganjo for the past three years. Her business challenges are the lack of proper storage to store perishable goods and lack of funds to restock vegetables for selling.

She will use the loan proceeds of KES20,000 to buy beans, maize and to add to her stock of vegetables and fruit. Her goal in life is to become a wholesaler. Mercy is single and has two daughters. She describes herself as hard working, caring and respectable.

loans.use: To buy cabbages, maize and beans.

loans.name: Julias Mwangi

texts.en:
Julias is a mason. He works on the construction of stone houses at Kiganjo, a rural area which is near Thika town. He has been in the construction industry for the past three years. His business challenge is the low income which he gets paid. It is due to this challenge that he wants to start a grocery store and a shop.

He will use the proceeds of his loan of KES20,000 to buy home product goods in order to start a new business. Opening a shop and a grocery store will enable him to supplement his income and create a source of employment. His goal in life is to become a house building engineer. Julias is married and has two daughters. He describes himself as social, jovial, takes initiative and hard working.

loans.use: To buy goods and vegetables in order to start a grocery store.

loans.name: Patrick Kinyanjui

texts.en: Patrick is 22 years old, married, and has a two year old son. He transports passengers on the Makongeni-Kiganjo route near Thika town. His business challenge is the poor road transport network in the rainy season, as it is impassable using a motorbike. Patrick will use the loan of KES 20,000 to buy spare parts for his motorbike. His goal in life is to own another motorbike and to build a house for his family. He describes himself as honest and hard-working.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for his business' motorbike.

loans.name: Linah Chelatan

texts.en: Linah sells household products such as sugar, milk, tea leaves, and eggs to residents at the Barracks soldier camp which is near Thika town. She has one employee and has been in the business for two years now. Her business challenge is a lack of proper storage for milk. She will use the loan of KES 20,000 to restock goods she sells. Her goal in life is to become a wholesaler and own a boutique. Linah is married to a soldier and has three children. She is hardworking, social and a caring mother.

loans.use: To restock goods and buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
Nuestro socio JOSE ANTONIO tiene 74 años, es casado y tiene cinco hijos. El socio es natural de la ciudad D. Cusco. El socio pertenece al banco comunal “RICCHARY CUSCO” de la Asociación Arariwa. El socio es cesante jubilado D. poder judicial hace 20 años.  

El socio tiene su taller de confección de chompas y también tiene un negocio familiar de venta de artesanía. Ya son varios años con el negocio y le ha ido muy bien gracias a todo el empeño que pone en su trabajo. Nuestro socio es trabajador y emprendedor que saca adelante a su familia. El socio requiere el préstamo para comprar más materiales como lana para coleccionar chompas y chalinas.         
   
El socio se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
José Antonio is 74 years old; he is married and has five children. He is a native of the city of Cusco. He is a member of the "Ricchary Cusco" Community Bank, in the Arariwa Association. A former employee of the legal system, he has been retired for 20 years. He has a workshop that makes "chompas" (traditional knitted sweaters) and has a family business selling handcrafts. He has been in business for several years and has succeeded through hard work. He is an entrepreneur who provides for his family. He needs this loan to buy materials such as wool to make sweaters and scarves. He is grateful for the opportunity which this loan will provide him, and he undertakes to fulfil the repayment schedule.

Translated from Spanish by John Rynne, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy material such as wool to make sweaters and scarves.

loans.name: Margot

texts.es:
Nuestra socia MARGOT tiene 48 años, es casada y tiene dos hijos. Ella es natural D. la ciudad D. Cusco. La socia pertenece al banco comunal “RICCHARY CUSCO” D. la Asociación Arariwa. 

La socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la venta D. comida. La socia tiene un restaurante “El Ciencianito” (Cienciano equipo D. fútbol representativo D. la ciudad del Cusco) donD. venD. caldos D. cabeza, adobos y comida típica D. la región. Ya son varios años con el negocio y le ha ido muy bien gracias a todo el empeño que pone en su trabajo. Nuestra socia es trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia. La socia requiere el préstamo para aumentar el capital del negocio D. venta D. comida desea comprar insumos como papas, arroz, fideos, carne y verduras.            
   
La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Margot is 48 years old, married and has two children. She is a native of the city of Cusco. She belongs to the communal bank "Ricchary Cusco," which is part of the Arariwa Association. She alternates her activities in the home with the sale of food. She has a restaurant called “El Ciencianito” (Ciencianito is Cusco's soccer team), where she sells head broth, marinated meat and other food that is typical of the region. She has had this business for a number of years, and it has gone very well thanks to all of the effort that she puts into her work. Margot is very enterprising and hardworking because she wants to advance her family economically. She needs a loan to increase her working capital for her business; she wants to buy supplies such as potatoes, rice, noodles, meat and vegetables. Margot is very grateful for the opportunity provided through these means and she is committed to making her payments on time.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy supplies such as potatoes, rice, noodles, meat and vegetables for her business
